nodes.text: The massacre at Asyrphus took place on the terrestrial astronomical object Asyrphus, between the years 0 ABY and 3 ABY, when the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry faced a bombardment that saw the deaths of many of its troopers, including its comm tech and her droid. During attack on Haidoral Prime in 3 ABY, Hazram Namir, a soldier in the 61st who knew the technician, remembered the massacre on Asyrphus when recalling his time with her. Later that year, he compared the losses the 61st took on Asyrphus to the company's recent losses in its command structure.
The massacre at Asyrphus was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
